mapper.select: SELECT ins.code FROM devops_ingress_path path INNER JOIN devops_service svc ON path.service_id = svc.id INNER JOIN devops_service_instance sins ON svc.id = sins.service_id INNER JOIN devops_app_service_instance ins ON sins.instance_id = ins.id WHERE path.ingress_id = #{ingressId}
SELECT di. NAME FROM devops_ingress di, ( SELECT * FROM devops_ingress_path dip WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ) r WHERE di.id = r.ingress_id GROUP BY di. NAME

SELECT di.id id, di.project_id projectId, di.env_id envId, di.`name` name, di.`domain` domain, di.status, di.is_usable isUsable, di.cert_id certId, de.`name` envName, cmd.`status` commandStatus, cmd.command_type commandType, cmd.error error, de.`code` namespace, di.last_update_date, di.last_updated_by, di.creation_date, di.created_by, (SELECT derd.message FROM devops_env_resource der LEFT JOIN devops_env_resource_detail derd ON der.resource_detail_id = derd.id WHERE der.env_id = di.env_id AND der.kind = 'Ingress' AND der.name = di.name) AS message FROM devops_ingress di LEFT JOIN devops_env de on de.id = di.env_id LEFT JOIN devops_env_command cmd on di.command_id = cmd.id WHERE di.id = #{id};
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) > 0 exist FROM devops_ingress WHERE env_id = #{envId};
